title: Jetpack Navigation
subtitle:
Showcase of the Android Jetpack Navigation Component.

This component is designed to delegate much of navigation logic to a centralized hub.

title: Nemo Navigation
subtitle:
Opinionated mobile navigation flow handler.

Avoid boilerplate code when handle navigation programmatically.

title: Chart showcases
subtitle:
Implementation of MPAndroidChart library.

Handle dynamic data and display it in several types of chart.

title: QR scanner
subtitle:
Implementation of FotoApparat library and Barcode API.

Scan QR codes using this component.

title: Interpolator
subtitle: Showcase of different types of interpolators.
